Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
24.01.2014 JH SCR18672 Added plausi test on extracted bank ID from IBAN and entered bank ID
14.01.2014 SH SCR18565 Changed IBAN/Bankaccount handling
13.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
21.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
07.02.2012 SH SCR17107 Replaced call of GB500 with new version
22.06.2010 GB SCR15540 Replacement calls BMQ001 by the BMQ005
27.08.2009 SH SCR14823 Extended approval test, not allowed to approve
if current user also created the bank account
22.05.2009 SH SCR14656 Fixed problem with approval handling
15.05.2009 SH SCR14639 Removed test to disable button "Approve" if user
has no modifiy permission
05.05.2009 SH SCR14615 Fixed some problems with the approval handling
01.04.2009 SH SCR14514 Added aproval handling
27.02.2009 GB SCR14451 Added last parameter for call GB001
27.10.2008 SH SR14060 Added UFB563.PI.USERID = blank
21.02.2008 SH SCR13417 Added BMQ001 (MQ199) if new BDET row is created
10.11.2006 AK SCR12089 added (another empty) parameter when calling UFB563
06.11.2006 AK SCR12052 added (empty) parameter when calling UFB563
21.12.2005 SH SCR9823 Fixed bug button "History"
23.09.2004 SH SCR6930 Fixed bug with CODE_DESCRIPTION where CODE_TYPE=205
-- Shortcut labels
-- Shortcut handling
-- Button Approve
... initial update if a new BDET will be added
--- Set menu actions
-- Get bankdetails from database, if user wants to query/modify data
... else init variables on screen, if a new BDET row will be added
-- Reset menu actions
... extract bankaccount from IBAN
.. send message to user that approval is required
-- Show history for one field
-- Use values from DBHS in case of approval handling and modify mode
-- Show history of all BDET fields of the current BDET row
-- GB001 output parameters
-- Uses to store a new BEDT row (not for validations)
-- in case of Button "OK" or key "Enter"
-- Validation
... empty name of the owner
... empty city of the owner
... empty or invalid country of the owner
... The following validations have to be performed under special condition
... empty name of the bank
... empty address of the bank
... empty city of the bank
End BLOCK The following validations have to be performed under special condition
... empty or invalid country of the bank
-- Validate bankdetails
-- IBAN is mandatory
-- SWIFT is mandatory
... if bank account and IBAN is entered, the extracted bank account from IBAN must match
the bank account on screen
... if bank ID and IBAN is entered, the extracted bank ID from IBAN must match
the bank ID on screen
... general bankdetail test via GB001
-- No errors, store changes to database
End BLOCK --> in case of Button "OK" or key "Enter"
-- In case of button "Cancel" or key "ESC"
-- Leave program

ExpSyntax.val: VarMod ('{2,1}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{2,2}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{2,3}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{2,4}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{2,5}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{2,17}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{2,20}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{2,23}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{2,26}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{2,29}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{2,30}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{2,31}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{2,32}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{2,38}'VAR)

Text.val: -- Only if a new row has to be stored to database
.. Write MQ199 to inform the users about new entered bankaccounts misc. payments
... set output parameter if a new row has to be stored
... in case of modifications set approval flag
-- Write always histroy, not for the last 4 BDET fields, see R.M.
-- There're 4 BDET fields where not always a new history row has to
be stored, but history has to be updated
@ We cannot use UFB563 to write history, because the related 4 BDET fields are
not allways updated
-- Always store history if a new BDET is stored
-- Update DBHS regarding the approval handling
-- If a BDET is updated, don't always store new history rows
... if no approval is required store always history
-- Store MQ250 for further approval handling via OMQ250
-- Select most actual DBHS row of current user, written just before via GB500
-- Get possible values from DBHS (last field changes) if approval is required
-- Updates if BDET_WAITFORAPPROVAL = Y
(Bankaccount is not activated yet)
-- Updates if BDET_WAITFORAPPROVAL = N
(Changes in bankid, bankaccount, swiftcode or iban)
-- Independent of the values of DBHS_WAITFORAPPROVAL

SQL_STMT_U.val: select MQDT_DEPT_CODE, MQDT_USRID, MQDT_LINENO from :1/MQDT where MQDT_MQTY_ID = 250 and MQDT_INVO_NO = :2 for fetch only

Text.val: -- Taks use DSQL to avoid problems with lost records which are deleted in BMQ010
